content.raw:
I needed to comment this because I am getting this CMake error.  It is a bit obscure, any ideas why?

    CMake Error at /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnCreateDocs.cmake:30 (add_subdirectory):
      The binary directory
    
        /home/docker/ignition/ign-sensors/build/doc
    
      is already used to build a source directory.  It cannot be used to build
      source directory
    
        /home/docker/ignition/ign-sensors/doc
    
      Specify a unique binary directory name.
    Call Stack (most recent call first):
      CMakeLists.txt:97 (ign_create_docs)
    
    
    -- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
    See also "/home/docker/ignition/ign-sensors/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
    See also "/home/docker/ignition/ign-sensors/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log".
    Makefile:776: recipe for target 'cmake_check_build_system' failed
    make: *** [cmake_check_build_system] Error 1

‌
